casebody.data:
Smith et al. v. Smith. April 29, 1895.

Brought forward from the last term.

Petition for receiver, etc. Before Judge Butt. Muscogee county. December 7, 1894. Blandeord & Grimes, for plaintiffs in error. Brannon, Hatcher & Martin, contra. Atkinson, J.

Under the particular facts of this case, as disclosed by the record, there was no abuse of discretion in appointing a receiver. Judgment, affirmed.
